languages.text: {n}Побледневший техножрец взирает на тварь со смесью ярости и отвращения, его визор сияет попеременно синим и зеленым. Под броней чудовища начинает искрить, выгорая, проводка, будто гнев Паскаля испепеляет ее.{/n}

{n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Побледневший техножрец взирает на тварь со смесью ярости и отвращения, его визор сияет попеременно синим и зеленым. Под броней чудовища начинает искрить, выгорая, проводка, будто гнев Паскаля испепеляет ее.{/n}

{n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}いつもよりさらに顔色の悪いパスカルが、怒りと嫌悪の入り混じった表情で、青と緑に点滅するバイザー越しにその存在を見つめている。まるでパスカルの怒りがその内部を焼き尽くすかのように、モンスターの装甲の下の焼けた回路からいくつかの火花が飛び散っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}いつもよりさらに顔色の悪いパスカルが、怒りと嫌悪の入り混じった表情で、青と緑に点滅するバイザー越しにその存在を見つめている。まるでパスカルの怒りがその内部を焼き尽くすかのように、モンスターの装甲の下の焼けた回路からいくつかの火花が飛び散っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plus pâle que jamais, Pasqal observe la créature d'un regard teinté de rage et de dégoût tandis que son viseur clignote en bleu et vert. Quelques étincelles jaillissent des circuits brûlés du monstre, comme si la colère de Pasqal incendiait ses entrailles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plus pâle que jamais, Pasqal observe la créature d'un regard teinté de rage et de dégoût tandis que son viseur clignote en bleu et vert. Quelques étincelles jaillissent des circuits brûlés du monstre, comme si la colère de Pasqal incendiait ses entrailles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的脸色比平时更加苍白。他以愤怒而厌恶的眼神盯着这台怪物，面甲上闪烁着蓝绿色的光芒。怪物的护甲之下，被烧毁的电路中飞溅出几朵火花，仿佛帕斯卡的怒火正在灼烧着它的内脏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的脸色比平时更加苍白。他以愤怒而厌恶的眼神盯着这台怪物，面甲上闪烁着蓝绿色的光芒。怪物的护甲之下，被烧毁的电路中飞溅出几朵火花，仿佛帕斯卡的怒火正在灼烧着它的内脏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, aún más pálido de lo normal, mira a la criatura con una mezcla de rabia y asco mientras su visor parpadea en azul y verde. Unas chispas salen de los circuitos quemados de la armadura de la alimaña, como si la ira de Pasqal prendiera fuego a sus entrañas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, aún más pálido de lo normal, mira a la criatura con una mezcla de rabia y asco mientras su visor parpadea en azul y verde. Unas chispas salen de los circuitos quemados de la armadura de la alimaña, como si la ira de Pasqal prendiera fuego a sus entrañas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ist noch blasser als sonst. Er starrt die Kreatur mit einer Mischung aus Wut und Ekel an, während sein Visor blau und grün blinkt. Einige Funken sprühen aus den verbrannten Platinen unter der Rüstung des Monsters, als würde Pasqals Zorn sein Inneres in Brand setzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ist noch blasser als sonst. Er starrt die Kreatur mit einer Mischung aus Wut und Ekel an, während sein Visor blau und grün blinkt. Einige Funken sprühen aus den verbrannten Platinen unter der Rüstung des Monsters, als würde Pasqals Zorn sein Inneres in Brand setzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın beti benzi atmış, normalden de solgun görünüyor. Yaratığa öfke ve iğrenmeyle bakıyor. Yeşil ve mavi renkleri, vizöründe dans ediyor âdeta. Canavarın zırhının altındaki yanık devrelerden kıvılcımlar çıkarken Pasqal'ın hiddeti, yaratığı içten içe tutuşturuyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal, even paler than normal, is staring at the creature with a mixture of rage and disgust, his visor flashing blue and green. A few sparks fly out of the burnt circuitry beneath the monster's armour, as if Pasqal's anger is setting its insides on fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın beti benzi atmış, normalden de solgun görünüyor. Öfke ve iğrenmeyle bakıyor yaratığa. Yeşil ve mavi renkleri, vizöründe dans ediyor âdeta. Canavarın zırhının altındaki yanık devrelerden kıvılcımlar çıkarken Pasqal'ın hiddeti, yaratığı içten içe tutuşturuyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
